text: Boris Nepokupnoy (, born 1887, date of death unknown) was a Russian fencer and modern pentathlete. He competed in the individual sabre and modern pentathlon at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Russian male fencers Category:Russian male modern pentathletes Category:Olympic fencers of Russia Category:Olympic modern pentathletes of Russia Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Modern pentathletes at the 1912 Summer Olympics
title: Boris Nepokupnoy
